p: The optimal reaction mix for the real-time LAMP assay consisted of 10-μL Isothermal Master Mix OptiGene (ISO-001), 0.2 μM of F3/B3, 0.4 μM of LoopF/LoopB, 0.8 μM of FIP/BIP and 2 μL of template DNA (5 ng/μL) in a final volume of 20 μL. The melting peak for A. bungii samples was 83.5 ± 0.5 °C (Fig. 3).
